name: railsx.co
overview:
We’re a talented We are a talented team committed to results. We eat, sleep and breathe what we do and we focus this passion on every project. Ruby on Rails, UI/UX, Python, PHP, JQuery, .NET, Javascript, HTML 5 and Mobile Development should say it all.

We’re not like all of the other development companies out there. We’ve spent years working in the corporate world and for startups and we understand what it takes to successfully deliver a project. We also have great attitudes and that’s a key part of ensuring a project is successful. We carefully listen and define the project objectives and ensure we capture the vision of what you are trying to accomplish. We love what we do and we love helping others bring their dreams to life. We’re thrilled when we help our clients earn revenue and change their lives.

We look at ourselves and what we do as opportunity builders. You dream it and we’ll build it and help you cultivate and grow your idea.

Our development team has years of experience developing web applications.
